summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-Powered Predictive Congestion Management System for Bangalore city. All backend APIs working correctly, frontend UI fully functional with proper integration.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/ returns correct response with message and version
Backend API /api/locations returns 4 Bangalore locations (silk_board, kr_puram, whitefield, hebbal)
Backend API /api/days returns all 7 days of week
Backend API /api/predict-traffic works with valid inputs and returns proper predictions
Backend API validates invalid location with 400 status
Backend API validates invalid day with 400 status
Backend API validates end_hour < start_hour with 400 status
All 4 locations work correctly for traffic prediction
Frontend loads with sidebar and map visible
Location dropdown shows all 4 locations with proper data-testid selectors
Day dropdown shows all 7 days with proper data-testid selectors
Hour selectors work correctly (0-23 range)
Generate Prediction button triggers API call successfully
Map flies to selected location on prediction
Results panel shows hour-wise traffic with color coding (red for high, orange for moderate)
Congestion insight panel shows peak hour advice
Traffic markers appear on map with proper color coding
Form validation works - shows toast error for incomplete fields
Map integration works - shows 4 traffic markers for all locations
Traffic legend visible with Normal/Moderate/High levels
Professional dark theme UI with proper contrast
Real-time updates when switching between locations

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor data-testid issue with map markers
